Issue.creator: clydedacruz
Issue.summary: Chain created by by same user on operator dashboard, does not appear on
Issue.environment: MODE=dev make start # make build-user-dashbaord-js At this point both the dashboards are started up. >
Issue.description: MODE=dev make start # make build-user-dashbaord-js At this point both the dashboards are started up. I then added one worker. h2. Issue {color:#ff0000}If I create a new chain on the Operator dashboard , the chain is not visible on the user dashboard. ** {color} I am logged in as the same user on both dashboards. >
